snippet: Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman’s office issued subpoenas the Long Island Power Authority and Consolidated Edison as part of an investigation into whether the utilities violated state laws in their response to Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Attorney General Eric T Schneiderman’s office issues subpoenas to the Long Island Power Authority and Consolidated Edison as part of an investigation into whether the utilities violated state laws in their response to Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman’s office issued subpoenas the Long Island Power Authority and Consolidated Edison as part of an investigation into whether the utilities violated state laws in their response to Hurricane Sandy.

headline.seo: Schneiderman Subpoenas Con Edison and LIPA Over Storm
headline.main: Schneiderman Subpoenas Utilities Over the Storm
headline.print_headline: Schneiderman Subpoenas Con Edison and L.I. Power Authority Over Storm
